messages.message: Is there documentation on connecting Flows together using hooks yet?
Are hooks what the Marketplace team is working on for combining binaries? cc: @Justin
I believe hooks are @rahul’s project, marketplace team hasn't commenced yet
I think Infra was working on it
Ahh I thought that project was more UDF-style pre and post . flow hooks, not necessarily chaining flows.
(Asking cause if this exists already and works, we should document it for customers as well!)
That is fine as well, mostly looking for any efforts that result in having multiple Flows running in a chain, no matter the mechanism
My understanding is that combining flows with pre/post flow hooks would need to invoke the flow api? Regardless, yea sounds like either Rahul or the infra team can comment more.
Yeah so altho pre/post-flow hooks are implemented, I don’t think the flow api is supported? @dlluncor might be able to provide more insight?

Currently we can’t call the Flow API from the pre-flow or post-flow hooks. Technically it’s something that would be possible — but ultimately will be determined by @Karthik S @abhilash and @shaunak on how they want to support the use-case
